title: Viktor
body: Look at my match history. im shit at vik. need training viktor mains prefered

replies.body: if you cant hit 19/20 lasers keep practicing full range is best range bait the open run tenacity and turn

The only thing i find hard about him is using his E.

Other abilities are pretty simple.

Q - poke
W - engage, disengage
R - execute

> [{quoted}](name=JustTrash,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=vpZ3Pah7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-29T09:20:17.978+0000)
>
> The only thing i find hard about him is using his E.
> 
> Other abilities are pretty simple.
> 
> Q - poke
> W - engage, disengage
> R - execute

Q is pretty poor poke as the first part doesn't do much damage and to get the second part off you have to be close to the enemy for a while as even if you back off then come back they'll be ready for it and it's short range.

You can't engage with W unless the enemy just sits inside it after you put it down. It's used for zone control which can bait people into coming into your range, but it's not a tool for engaging.

You can use R to execute but the damage it deals while being controlled is enormous. It's usually better to use it when it will get the biggest AoE effect or you know you can keep it stuck to someone.

E is simple. Harass, waveclear, or damage, you just need to use it depending on what you need. Aside from that, if you have trouble aiming it, then try changing your settings.

> [{quoted}](name=Oceanic Man,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=vpZ3Pah7,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-02-29T09:09:24.291+0000)
>
> Look at my match history. im shit at vik. need training viktor mains prefered

Add me if you want and I'll try and help you out.
hes one of the most popular mid laners for the pro scene

Learn to aim E, win games, get bitches.

Can't skillshot?

Pick a different champion.
